src_original: kāya{smṛtyupasthānānaṃ} vedanā{smṛtyupasthānānaṃ} citta{smṛtyupasthānānaṃ} dharma{smṛtyupasthānānaṃ}/  20401 tatra katamat kāya{smṛtyupasthānānaṃ}/

bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī {{viharati/  na ca kāyasahagatān vitarkān vitarkayati tac cānupalambhayogena/}}  20404 adhyātmabahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī {{viharati/  na ca kāyasahagatān vitarkān vitarkayati tac cānupalambhayogena/
evaṃ adhyātmaṃ vedanāsu citte  20406 adhyātmaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī {{viharati/
